tool_description:
Introduction

The purpose of this document is to provide technical details about the API's. This document outlines the business processes supported by the API and details about specifications of API’s. It assumes that reader has a technical background and is familiar with JSON, API's.

Connection properties
The communication with the system is performed through https connections. The following table enlists the properties of the request that must be employed:

Request	value	Description
Reques...
title: THT Tour XML OUT API

api_list.name: TourPriceList
TimeSlot
TourOption
BookingCancel
XOBookings
GetBookedTicket
countries
CheckAvailability
api_list.description: To Check is Tour available on specified Time Slot

api_list.name: Tourpolicy
TourStaticData
TourStaticDataById
api_list.description: To Fetch Tour Static Data by Id

api_list.name: cities
api_list.description: To Fetch All Cities based on Country Id

api_list.name: TourOptionStaticData
api_list.description: To Fetch Tour Option Static Data

api_list.name: TourPriceList
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tht-tour-xml-out-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/Tour/tourlist"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tht-tour-xml-out-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
